title: The Best Plays and the Year Book of the Drama in America
aka: The Burns Mantle Best Plays and the Year Book of the Drama in America
additional-notes: Copyright renewals for these annual volumes were filed under Books rather than under Periodicals.

The first contribution renewal shown here is for a play whose copyright renewal was filed under Contributions to Periodicals specifically mentioning the designated volume.  Copyrights to other plays included in this serial may have also been filed under Drama.  We have not checked copyrights under Drama.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Scott F Andrews and Peter Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
